articles.title: European Cup Winners Cup final highlights: City 2-1 Gornik Zabrze - Manchester City FC
articles.description: On this day 50 years ago Manchester City were crowned European Cup Winners Cup champions.
articles.content:
A Joe Mercer side full of men who would go on to cement their status as City legends defeated Polish outfit Gornik Zabrze 2-1 at Viennas Prater Stadium to lift what remains the Clubs only continental title.
